title: Kennesaw Mountain National Battlefield Park: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Be A Junior Ranger          Â    Remember your trip to Kennesaw Mountain National Battlefield for years to come! Stop by the park to pick up a Junior Ranger (available in English and Spanish) or Wee Ranger Booklet (ages 4 - 6), or you can download them from our website. Once you complete all the activities, have your booklet checked by a ranger. You'll receive a Kennesaw Mountain Junior Ranger badge, certificate, and other items that you'll have to see for yourself! Also, learn how to become a Junior Civil War Historian.     Download and complete a Junior Ranger or Wee Ranger Booklet. Submit your completed booklet in person or by mail!   Kennesaw Mountain National Battlefield Park 900 Kennesaw Mountain Drive Kennesaw, Ga 30152              *Adobe Reader is required. If you do not have the free software, please download and install it on your computer.
